content: परिपंथिन् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} Standing in the way, obstructing, opposing, hindering (said by Pāṇini to be admissible only in the Veda, but see the quotations given below); अर्थपरिपंथी महानरातिः <ls>Mu. 5</ls>; नाभविष्यमहं तत्र यदि तत्परिपंथिनी <ls>Māl. 9. 50</ls>; so <ls>Bv. 1. 62</ls>, <ls>Bg. 3. 34</ls>; <ls>Ms. 7. 107</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">1. 10.</ls> {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} {@--1@} An enemy, antagonist, opponent, a foe. {@--2@} A robber, thief, highwayman.
